channel.title: Book Club on World Bank Data Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Book Club on World Bank Data Lab

item.title: FY21 Q3: What's the Future Book Club
item.description: The Data Lab supports learning about both the digital world and each other through books. Every quarter, we organize a speed dating book fair, to help staff find their perfect book match.

item.title: Author Talk: Cathy O'Neil, Weapons of Math Destruction
